text: Tristia is a work of poetry written by the Roman poet Ovid at some time after he was banished from Rome in AD 8. Tristia may also refer to: * Tristia (city), a fictional location in the game Tristia of the Deep-Blue Sea * Tristia (Berlioz), a musical work published in 1852 * Tristia Harrison (born 1973), a British businesswoman
title: Tristia (disambiguation)
